name: 6lbr
tagline: A deployment-ready 6LoWPAN Border Router solution based on Contiki
body:
A 6LoWPAN Border Router connects your 6LoWPAN devices to the Internet and is responsible for handling traffic to and from the IPv6 and 802.15.4 interfaces. 6LBR is a deployment-ready solution for border routers, based on [**Contiki OS**](http://www.contiki-os.org).

Content under construction

### Contact

The 6LBR issue tracker is open to all. Also, feel free to contact us for feedback or bugfixes at 6lbr@cetic.be
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
